entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
